original_text: And Adam said, This is now bone of my bones, and flesh of my flesh: she shall be called Woman, because she was taken out of Man.
korean_text: 아담이 이르되 이는 내 뼈 중의 뼈요 살 중의 살이라 이것을 남자에게서 취하였은즉 여자라 부르리라 하니라

sentences.original_text: This is now bone of my bones
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 이것은 나의 뼈中的 뼈니

sentences.original_text: because she was taken out of Man
